body.name: MAD SHARK Santoku Knife 8 Inch, Japanese Chef Knife, Multi-purpose Kitchen Cooking Knife for Chopping Meat and Vegetables, Ergonomic 2.0 Handle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Long-lasting Sharpness】Forged from German military molybdenum-vanadium steel that effectively resists rust, corrosion, and discoloration, with high-temperature forging, ice-water quenching, this 8 inch Santoku knife boasts superior durability and enduring sharpness than other chef knives.

【Exclusive Handle】Real Ergonomic 2.0 Handle, more than just words. After repeated experiments, finally we get the shape of the handle that best suits most people’s hands. The ergonomic streamline full tang handle provides a stunning grip, excellent control and comfort, reduced wrist tension, and enhanced flexibility.
【Hollow Edge】The hollow indentations on the Granton blade create air bubbles between food and the kitchen knife, prevent food from clinging to the surface, allowing for smoother, faster meal prep.
【Impressive Performance】Perfect for cutting, chopping and slicing meat, fish and vegetables, with ease and precision, this versatile knife can do most kitchen jobs.
【Best Gift】Each chef knife comes with an exquisite gift box, making it an excellent present for any home cook or professional chef.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MAD SHARK knives are forged from German military molybdenum-vanadium steel that effectively resists rust, corrosion, and discoloration. The razor-sharp edge is easy to maintain and makes cutting and chopping a breeze. The solid handle is comfortable to hold. JAPANESE CHEF KNIFE Santoku — three virtues — slicing, dicing, mincing.

Razor Sharp Blade New special steel forging technique for military use and the addition of many rare elements like C, CR, MO, V, CO give this Santoku knife super-high hardness and long-lasting sharpness. Precise and Clean Cut The hollow indentations on the Granton blade are not only beautiful but also prevent food from clinging to the surface, allowing for smoother, faster meal prep. All-around Cooking Knife 8 inch is the perfect size for multi-purpose like cutting, chopping and slicing meat, fish and vegetables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much Loved Gift!
reviews.reviewText: I gave this knife as a gift to a family member who is pretty particular about his cutlery and cookware. It was a hit! He's used it many times in the past few weeks and says it's his new favorite, go-to prep knife.The weight of it is very nice. Looks are appealing and the blade stays sharp and smooth.I'm thinking about buying one for myself now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good knife
reviews.reviewText: This was the best thing or knife I’ve ever owned. Very sharp and handles very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I cook everything from scratch which means a LOT of chopping. This knife has helped minimize the impact that extensive chopping has on my arm, wrist and shoulder. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved it
reviews.reviewText: Bought for daughter in law and she absolutely loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Sharp and Easy to Clean, But there's no Sheath or Anything for Storage
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best cooking knives I've ever used. It's very very sharp, strong and glides through anything with ease. I've used to to cut some of the densest and driest things out there. Sandwhiches, porkchops, terribly dry chicken, and even a turkey. It went through everything like I was trying to cut paper on a razor sharp blade. The only complaint I have is that it doesn't come with anything to store it. Unless you have another knife block or an open spot that can fit it, you'll have to keep it in the box in the foam, which to me isn't the most sanitary thing. I would recommend this for anyone who cooks and needs a good knife, but they really need to include something for safety since it comes so sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy not recommended for people with arthritis
reviews.reviewText: Heavy in the handle hard to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice knife, clean cuts, handles well
reviews.reviewText: Gave this knife a turn at cutting down a rib roast into some steaks. Cut very well, smooth, and required no extra effort to make the cuts I wanted. A few pulls on a steel, and a long pull through the beef, and had a nice deep cut. (Yeah, I have other knives better suited for this kinda work, but I had this knife for several weeks, and just had to try it on something worthwhile!) The knife comes packed in a very nice box, and would make an excellent gift, if you have friends who will take care of their knives. I wouldn't give this to someone who uses a butterknife as a screwdriver...
